title: I cant get hextech chest!?
body: I main Caitlyn{{champion:51}}  and I have lvl 7 on her and I cant get chest,sometimes Im really good and I get grade S and there is no chest, I only get a keys! pleease I will go crazy! :O :O  Thanks for help{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
Players can earn a chest for champions they own and receive an S with, but there are some additional requirements.  It looks like you've already received a chest for Caitlyn, and you may only receive one chest for a champion per season.  

You can also check the champion section of your profile tab for gold borders that show which champions you've earned a chest for.  We also have a [champion mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) guide that provides some more details on chest eligibility.

I hope that helps clear things up, and congrats on level 7 on Caitlyn!
